OOC: Yanshosh said something as Soundwave so I thought he was back but 
because I'm not sure I'm going to take my friends advice and change Koj body 
into a protoform I know and understand alot better after seeing it fight.

::Inu-Yasha::

Flies high over a vaccant section of the planet.


::Koj::

Looking down at the earth "No it can't be Tekno Crsytals there not labeled 
as being on earth." Koj gets off Inu looks at the small Field of Tekno 
Crsytals. Gently Removes all the Crsytals and sets them on Inu-Yasha. As the 
Fly back to Koj Ship.

::While later::


::Koj::

"Computer scan all areas for tekno Crsytals and report on power of these 
Crsytals."


::Computer::
"No other source of power found. Tenko Crsytals are strong enough to power 
one mega defense weapons but are required to be forged first.
